mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.account_id AS accountId, a.title, a.content, a.view_count AS viewCount, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.updated_at AS updatedAt, b.username FROM notice a INNER JOIN account b ON a.account_id = b.id ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT a.id, a.account_id AS accountId, a.title, a.content, a.view_count AS viewCount, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.updated_at AS updatedAt, b.username FROM notice a INNER JOIN account b ON a.account_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( account_id, title, content ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{title}, #{content} )
